member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.CmdMap.CmdList
member.summary: List of command names and aliases.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.CmdMap.CmdMap
member.summary: Mapping from command name to Cmd.

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.CmdMap
member.summary: This is a mapping from a command name to the corresponding command (Cmd).

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.SubCommands
member.summary: A list of sub-command strings that can be used with this command. This list provides a way to tab-complete a keyword.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.CmdName
member.summary: The name of the command.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.CmdHelp
member.summary: Command-specific help string.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.CmdDescr
member.summary: Short command description.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.CmdAlias
member.summary: Aliases for the command.

member.name: M:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd.CallBack(B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.CmdMap,B2R2.BinGraph.BinEssence,Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{System.String})
member.summary: A command callback function. This function takes in an Agent (arbiter), a CmdMap, and a list of arguments as input, and produces some side effects.

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Cmd
member.summary: Cmd represents a command that can be invoked within B2R2's CLI.

member.summary: Unknown Size

member.summary: Zero size is used to indicate ASCII string.

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.PrintSize.EightBytes
member.summary: 8 bytes (g).

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.PrintSize.FourBytes
member.summary: 4 bytes (w).

member.summary: 2 bytes (h).

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.PrintSize.OneByte
member.summary: 1 byte (b).

member.name: T:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.DuplicateCommandException
member.summary: Raised when there are duplicate commands with the same name or alias.

member.name: P:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.CmdSpec.spec
member.summary: Command specification in *alphabetic* order. The entries in this list should match with the KeyWords of help commands (in defaultCmds).

member.name: F:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Main.BinExplorerOpts.EnableReadLine@
member.summary: Enable readline mode or not. This option will be removed when .NET bug: https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/32174 is fixed.

member.name: F:B2R2.Utilities.BinExplorer.Main.BinExplorerOpts.ISA@
member.summary: Specify ISA. This is only meaningful for universal (fat) binaries because BinHandler will automatically detect file format by default. When a fat binary is given, we need to choose which architecture to explorer with this option.

member.summary: Dump each CFG in JSON format?

member.summary: Enable visualization.
